name: Spacewoman - The Incredible Woman From Space
name_original: Spacewoman - The Incredible Woman From Space
description:
Spacewoman - The Incredible Woman From Space! Spacewoman is the most advanced woman from space in existence! Pilot her around the galaxy to find her destiny!

A visual novel, of sorts. CONTROLS: CLICK STUFF! Click to advance the story, click to choose a choice when choices pop up.

Currently in development. It's playable, but not to the end. UPDATE DEC. 17! Now there are endings! Plus, it should resize, which should make it playable on mobile!

Art is from OpenGameArt, all CC0:

  • Grapple Girl (I took a screenshot from the 3D previewer.)
  • Oldschool Bitmap Font
